QuestData.Title: Destroy the Legion
QuestData.Description: The remains of the demonic Burning Legion have been a thorn in our side for far too long!$B$BNo more!$B$BThe demons are attacking from the areas known as Felfire Hill, Demon Fall Canyon and Demon Fall Ridge to the east.$B$BGo and destroy as many as you can to bring glory to both yourself and the Horde!
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay 15 of any demon type at Felfire Hill, Demon Fall Canyon, or Demon Fall Ridge.
QuestData.CompletionText: Are there not demons yet standing? You call yourself a $r? This is no time to be taking a break from the fighting!
QuestData.RewardText: That's better! There's nothing quite like ridding our world of a demon. And they make for worthy opponents as well, unlike the weak races of the Alliance.
